title: Pixel 2xl randomly reboots on mobile internet jio 4G
content: i am using a pixel 2xl phone bought in 2018, recently i started using 4g volte service in jio as 3g is down in my area. My phone now randomly reboots on using mobile internet.. as soon as i use apps using location service such as gpay, ola, uber. Trying reinstalling apps and doing factory resets ..but not resolved. Has my battery become old ?
